website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost solar pest repellent that delivers continuous repeller action to keep small animals away from your yard.
pros: Emits vibrations and sonic sounds every 10 seconds
Green color blends in well to outdoor spaces
cons: Only available as a single unit

customer_reviews.title: grandpa's gift
customer_reviews.text: old man was doing his gardening and the the gift for him to keep mouse away..
customer_reviews.author: Richard Solero

customer_reviews.title: has not repelled any gophers
customer_reviews.text: Won't work, I have had it in my yard for 1 month, still have gophers. The gopher mound are no more than 10 ft away and some are within 1 foot.
customer_reviews.author: fordsman00

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The gopher was right next to it staring at it. No good. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bellelady

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Ordered the replacement. Still didn’t work. Order the two pack of smaller ones from a different vendor and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The voles are regularly meeting directly under it. They don't seem to care about the noise.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have done the job...no new mole holes as of now
customer_reviews.author: Bette M

customer_reviews.title: Voles camp out right under this thing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless, voles still have eaten all my potatoes and onions and tunnel through garden without any sign this thing bothers them.
customer_reviews.author: Deceived

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Zero effect — moles as busy as ever. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schnaidt

customer_reviews.title: Product was not effectIve. Then it didn’t matter both just stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 last summer. Really never effective. After a couple of months they both stopped working. Yes, they were in bright sunlight, I put them away for the winter hoping they would work this spring. They do not. Don’t waste your Money. I gave one star but it deserves zero.
customer_reviews.author: Peggi

customer_reviews.title: Large and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have used these before and they always seem to work well. This one is a bit larger but I really like it. I have a large yard, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

product_meta.title: Vensmiles Solar Powered Mole Repeller Repel Gophers Voles Rats Without Poison Outdoor Use for Garden Lawn Yard Farm
feature_bullets: Vensmile Solar Powered Mole Repeller uses solar energy to vibrate and emit a 400 Hz - 1000HZ sonic frequency every 10 seconds to keep moles, gophers,voles and other rodents away from that area.Idea pest control device to drive away moles from your garden or lawns by utilizing both sonic wave sound and vibration technology.

Effective Range: 8,000 sq.ft radiates in all directions. It is recommended to use multiple devices to overlap providing even more coverage. It may take 2-3 weeks for the rodents to completely leave the habitat.
A poison-free way to drive away burrowing pests. No troublesome chemicals or nuisance pesticide, no traps, no dead animals. You just need to dig a hole then inserted it to the ground.

By utilizing the power & built-in solar panels, the repeller charges on its own with the help of batteries included with your purchase. This means your lawns and gardens are protected even during the night and on cloudy days.When fully charged, the mole repellent maintain continuous 24hours/7days protection even when cloudy day.
WEATHERPROOF: Suitable for all weather conditions. But Choose the best sun location, so the solar panel to can receive the light as directly as possible.
